Question: Although it was never explained why, they decided not to take this person with them.
Hints: In 1997, documents purporting to prove a coverup of a relationship between JFK and this person were discovered to be fraudulent.
I owe this person a real debt ...it was because of her that I played the Mocambo, a very popular nightclub in the '50s.
Within ten days this person had announced her separation from Miller, and Gable had died from a heart attack.
